mapper.select:
select
from t_loc_type where status=1
AND dest_id = #{destId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND type_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{typeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by dest_id , rank

select
from t_loc_type where status = 1 and area_level in (1,2) order by dest_id , name_code
